text: Stipen nop pakel kumak anɨb ak, bɨ Sol tep kumub agak. Stipen kumek, bɨ God nop nɨŋɨd kɨdek golɨgup ogɨnap, chɨb gek chaŋ lɨlɨg dam kamɨlak. Ñɨn anɨb ak, Juda kay kɨli binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd Jelusalem yelɨgɨpal okok, kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨg gɨlak. Sol ne kal mɨgan kɨli amɨlɨg, binɨb okok kɨlop monmon pak lɨpɨg dam nag lolɨgup. Anɨgek, ogɨnap pɨlɨk, Samaliya plopens amɨl, ogɨnap pɨlɨk Judiya plopens tɨgoŋ okok amnɨlak. Bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb anep umɨgan ak, kɨli pen Jelusalem yelak.
